name: The Dreadmill
description:
Are you ready to challenge The Dreadmill?

- Endless runner, with one-tap controls and frantic gameplay. How far can you get?
- Challenge your friends through Game Center. Who can get the highest score?
- Costumes - Use your coins to earn a variety of costumes, with more added regularly!
- Premium Packs - Purchase a special Triple-Costume Pack to earn extra coins every time you wear them!
- Special Modes - Experience the fast-paced Goldrush event for a chance to win even more coins!

The Dreadmill has an incredibly simple, pick-up-and-play mechanic - that gets very hard very quickly. The idea is simple - tap the screen to jump Bit to the next blue block, whilst avoiding the red ones. Keep going for as long as you can, collecting the bonuses as you go. Your score at the end, as well as any bonuses collected are all converted into coins, which you can use to open the ‘Mystery Crate’ and unlock a new costume for Bit to wear.
